text:
where `needles` and `hay` are relatively small (0..32) tuples of symbols, to find the symbols in hay that are *not* in needles:
Can I do better in performance (more important) / memory use than:
```not_occurs_in(needles, hay) = 
hay[[foldl(.&,map(.!,[n .== hay for n in needles]))...]]```

elements.text: are relatively small (0..32) tuples of symbols, to find the symbols in hay that are

in needles:
Can I do better in performance (more important) / memory use than:

not_occurs_in(needles, hay) = 
hay[[foldl(.&,map(.!,[n .== hay for n in needles]))...]]
